text: Kundian Junction railway station () is located in Kundian Pakistan. Kundian Jn. is in midway of Rawalpindi-Multan section of PR. Mianwali Express train travels to Lahore from Mari Indus, Kundian, Sargodha, Sangla Hill etc. From Kundian Thal Express, Mehar Express, Khushhal Khan Khattak Express and Mianwali Express also pass towards various places to Multan, Karachi. There is a big Railway colony with Railway Hospital School too. There is a big Loco motive Shed in Kundian too. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways Note: In 2011, trains running from this junction were suspended due to railway crisis. In 2018, Seikh Rasheed Minister of Railway announced to rehabilitate these trains. Since then this station has re-opened & all trains (mentioned above) are being run. ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Mianwali District Category:Railway stations on Sangla Hill–Kundian Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Kotri–Attock Railway Line (ML 2)
title: Kundian Junction railway station
